name: Inject Button
xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    <setBody>
        <simple>
<![CDATA[{{safe code}}]]>
        </simple>
    </setBody>
    {{#if (eq out_format "json")}}
    <unmarshal>
        <json/>
    </unmarshal>
    {{/if}}
    <multicast>
        {{#each target}}
        <to uri="direct:{{this}}"/>
        {{/each}}
    </multicast>
</route>
